blogPost.excerpt: With Birabo, you will never lose your project files, notes, folders and links again. Share them with your team in one workspace, in real-time.
blogPost.body: With Birabo, you will never lose your project files, notes, folders and links again. Share them with your team in one workspace, in real-time.
blogPost.title: Birabo - An effortless real-time collaboration tool for teams
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 使用Birabo，您再也不会丢失项目文件、笔记、文件夹和链接。在一个工作区中实时与您的团队共享它们。
localize.tagline: 为团队提供轻松的实时协作工具

localize.description: 使用Birabo，您再也不會丟失項目文件、筆記、文件夾和鏈接。在一個工作區中實時與您的團隊共享它們。
localize.tagline: 爲團隊提供輕鬆的實時協作工具

previous.excerpt: Startup Job Watch is a weekly updating database of over 6000 jobs from the top startups in the world. These are all companies that were on the best of lists from publications like Business Insider, Linkedin, AngelList, and more!
previous.title: Startup Job Watch - Database of 6000+ jobs from the top startups in the world

localize.description: Startup Job Watch是一个每周更新的数据库，其中包含来自世界顶级初创公司的6000多个工作岗位。这些都是来自Business Insider、LinkedIn、AngelList等出版物的最佳公司名单！
localize.tagline: 包含全球顶尖初创企业6000多个职位的数据库

localize.description: Startup Job Watch是一個每週更新的數據庫，其中包含來自世界頂級初創公司的6000多個工作崗位。這些都是來自Business Insider、LinkedIn、AngelList等出版物的最佳公司名單！
localize.tagline: 包含全球頂尖初創企業6000多個職位的數據庫

next.excerpt: Baaz enables live video commerce for retailers globally. A retail store can host live videos, manage catalogs, live chats, payments, shipping, promotions and influencers from Baaz app. All things related to live video shopping in one place.
next.title: Baaz - Create virtual showroom in less than 1 min & sell online

localize.description: Baaz为全球零售商提供现场视频商务服务。零售店可以托管实时视频，管理目录，实时聊天，支付，送货，促销和Baaz应用程序的影响力。所有与视频直播购物相关的东西都集中在一个地方。
localize.tagline: 在不到1分钟的时间内创建虚拟展厅并在线销售

localize.description: Baaz爲全球零售商提供現場視頻商務服務。零售店可以託管實時視頻，管理目錄，實時聊天，支付，送貨，促銷和Baaz應用程序的影響力。所有與視頻直播購物相關的東西都集中在一個地方。
localize.tagline: 在不到1分鐘的時間內創建虛擬展廳並在線銷售
